funfacts.item: Paris is not the city's original name
There’s only one stop sign in Paris
There are more dogs in Paris than there are children

interestingfacts.item: There is a Statue of Liberty in Paris that faces the Statue of Liberty in America, symbolizing the friendship between the two countries
James Joyce and Ernest Hemingway used to travel around Paris together, picking up fights with larger men
During WWI, France built a ‘Fake Paris’ near the capital city to confuse German pilots
